stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I really enjoyed this class. The professor kept me interested in all topics. Very informative. Loved his critiques.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Kelly is great. I had him for my night class for HIS 108. Class was 6:30-9:30. We never stayed past 8:45. This class is all lecture which I personally enjoy. He has so much enthusiasm and charisma. You can tell he loves what he teaches. Be sure to participate to keep discussions going! Show what you know and you\'ll do great. Stay professor Kelly!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He is a walking U.S. History book and is passionate. However, he jumps back and forth over the topics way too often. His exams are too specific and hard. Seemed impossible to get an A in the multiple choice. Part B of the exams are essays and you are able to prepare them ahead of time. His lectures can be very long and boring. Absolutely hated it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Hard, but if you study his notes & prep the essays before test, can get at least an A on the essays. The mult choices are part 1 of test & on the book. focus essay then on book. Get 1/2 the multiple choices correct and you still get a B. He helps after class, has no office hours and is not a Prof, but just Mr. Kelly.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: A lot of work.....however he is a walking history book, I found him very easy to work with and he helped with areas where I was uncertain. You will learn in this class if you put in the work...this class is not for lazy people!!!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: American History is interesting but instructor sommetimes jumped from one area to another???

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: saying the teacher is smart and passionate about the subject is an absolute understatement. when it comes to history he is a genius! he is a super hard grader though and gives only a few high rated assignments that you should thoroughly prep for. make us of the essay questions he gives you before hands. you will learn in his class!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: PS...its Prof. Kelly...not KellEy...idiot. Before insulting a professor who DOES know what he is talking about and teaching at least get the name right. Pay attention in class, read the book, and maybe you will learn something. Otherwise don\'t waste his time by taking the class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Excellent teacher and great guy. Whoever responded first clearly didn\'t try at all. If you do what he asks you will do well. He is extremely smart and interesting to listen to as he clearly loves what he is teaching. Anyone who disagrees is just bitter because they did not do well in his class. Pick up a book and learn how to read.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This teacher jumps all over the place and doesn\'t follow the text book. By reading the text book at home was the only way I could do any thing on his tests. He always asks for the littlest details on his tests and they are so hard. If taking this class good luck and make sure to read the text book thoroughly. Do all the essays before the test.
